code: @Override protected void encode(ChannelHandlerContext ctx, AddressedEnvelope<Object, InetSocketAddress> msg, List<Object> out) throws Exception {     if (msg.content() instanceof ByteBuf) {         ByteBuf payload = (ByteBuf) msg.content().         // Just wrap the message as DatagramPacket, need to make sure the message content is ByteBuf         DatagramPacket dp = new DatagramPacket(payload.retain(), msg.recipient()).         out.add(dp).     } else {         LOG.debug("Ignoring message content as it is not an io.netty.buffer.ByteBuf instance.").     } }
